characters.name: Omnath, Locus of Creation
characters.description:
When Omnath enters, draw a card.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you gain 4 life if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, add {R}{G}{W}{U}. If it's the third time, Omnath deals 4 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker you don't control.
characters.cardEffect:
When Omnath enters, draw a card.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you gain 4 life if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, add {R}{G}{W}{U}. If it's the third time, Omnath deals 4 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker you don't control.
characters.loreDescription: 젠디카르의 마나가 형상화된 정령. 땅의 힘 그 자체이다.

characters.name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
characters.description: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.
characters.cardEffect:
Flying
As Iona enters, choose a color.
Your opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.
characters.loreDescription: 에메리아의 축복을 받은 천사. No more shall the righteous cower before evil.
characters.flavorText: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

characters.name: Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet
characters.description: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.
characters.cardEffect: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.

characters.name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
characters.description: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
characters.cardEffect: Whenever Lorthos attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
characters.loreDescription: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
characters.flavorText: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.

characters.name: Nissa Revane
characters.description:
+1: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
+1: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control.
−7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

characters.name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
characters.description: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.
characters.cardEffect: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis.
characters.loreDescription: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.
characters.flavorText: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

characters.name: Sorin Markov
characters.description:
+2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
−3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10.
−7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

characters.name: Chandra Ablaze

−2: Each player discards their hand, then draws three cards.
−7: Cast any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard without paying their mana costs.

characters.description: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

characters.cardEffect: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, this creature deals 2 damage to that player.

characters.name: Kazandu Blademaster
characters.description:
First strike, vigilance
Whenever this creature or another Ally you control enters, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
characters.loreDescription: 젠디카르의 모험가 동맹. "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

characters.name: Kor Duelist
characters.description: As long as this creature is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
characters.loreDescription: 코르족 전사. "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

characters.name: Living Tsunami
characters.description:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
characters.loreDescription: 젠디카르의 마나가 형상화된 정령. At low tide it slumbers. At high tide it devours.

characters.name: Merfolk Seastalkers
characters.description:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{2}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
characters.loreDescription:
타지임의 머포크. "Do they seek knowledge or wealth? Are they bandits or benefactors? It depends on who is chanting the tale."
—Nikou, Joraga bard

Flying
When this creature enters, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
